label: temperature-sensor.get-in-room.success
answers: It's {{ temperature }} {{ unit }} in the {{ roomName }}.

label: temperature-sensor.get-in-room.fail.no-results
answers: No temperature values were recorded in the last 12 hours in this room.

label: temperature-sensor.get-in-room.fail.room-not-found
answers: I can't find a room with this name.
